content.rendered:
Teams

Bibledit can host many Bibles. Many users can create an account.

A translation team is formed by giving a group of users access to a Bible.

  • A user may be granted read-only access to a Bible, or write access. The type of access also depends on the role of a user. Manage users.
  • Bibles can be made viewable by all users. Manage Bibles.

Home
Review
